1.name: Tough Skin
1.details: Baal stores a portion of damage taken and heals back a percentage of it when out of combat.

2.name: Ox Force
2.details: Baal's next 3 basic attacks cleave in a small cone-shaped area, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all nearby enemies.

3.name: Triumph
3.details: Baal slams down his foot to the ground, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies and slowing them for a few seconds.

4.name: Bull Rush
4.details:
Baal charges forward, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.

If Baal hits an enemy Hero, Bull Rush will stop and knock the target up.

If Baal hits small monsters and minions, Bull Rush will knock them aside instead.

5.name: Unstoppable
5.details:
Baal becomes unstoppable for a few seconds, reducing all incoming damage by a percentage and becoming immune to all crowd controls.

Using Unstoppable will also break out from any form of crowd control he is currently in.
